parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From pros and a probable derivative of kuon; to fawn or crouch to, i.e. prostrate oneself in homage.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A dragon or huge serpent; met: Satan. Probably from an alternate form of derkomai; a fabulous kind of serpent.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
From exesti; privilege, i.e. force, capacity, competency, freedom, or mastery, delegated influence.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Properly: a wild beast, hence: any animal; met: a brute. Diminutive from the same as thera; a dangerous animal.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.
Like, similar to, resembling, of equal rank. From the base of homou; similar.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Properly: a wild beast, hence: any animal; met: a brute. Diminutive from the same as thera; a dangerous animal.
And, even, also, namely.

str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
To make war, contend, fight, battle. From polemos; to be in warfare, i.e. To battle: -fight, war.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Neuter 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
